cause.description:
Friends, it is about time somebody stood up and said "we were here first". Global Warming just some new fad somebody made up, but Global Cooling has been around since the 60's and I think its about time we stood up and did something about it!
1. Global Cooling is real
2. Polar Bears are dying
3. Who doesn't like polar bears?
cause.mission: Keep the the global warming crowd from stealing our spotlight!
cause.name: STOP Global Cooling!
